name: health-surveillance-system
description: Smart Health Surveillance System - Complete startup and testing

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:convex"
scripts.test:full: npm run test && echo 'Running frontend tests...' && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:frontend: echo 'Frontend tests placeholder - add Jest/Cypress tests here'
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm install && cd src/backend && npm install && cd ../.. && npx convex dev --once
scripts.health-check: cd src/backend && node -e "const axios = require('axios'); axios.get('http://localhost:5000/health').then(r => console.log('✅ Backend healthy:', r.data)).catch(e => console.log('❌ Backend error:', e.message))"
